section.title: CXType.h
section.programlisting: 00001 //===- CXTypes.h - Routines for manipulating CXTypes ----------------------===// 00002 // 00003 // Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. 00004 // See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information. 00005 // SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception 00006 // 00007 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00008 // 00009 // This file defines routines for manipulating CXCursors. 00010 // 00011 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00012 00013 #ifndef LLVM_CLANG_TOOLS_LIBCLANG_CXTYPE_H 00014 #define LLVM_CLANG_TOOLS_LIBCLANG_CXTYPE_H 00015 00016 #include "clang-c/Index.h" 00017 #include "clang/AST/Type.h" 00018 00019 namespace clang { 00020 00021 class ASTUnit; 00022 00023 namespace cxtype { 00024 00025 CXType MakeCXType(QualType T, CXTranslationUnit TU); 00026 00027 }} // end namespace clang::cxtype 00028 #endif
